resources: SYM_Labo3V2 Location needede We need location access to detect beacons. Please allow this app to use your location. Permission refusede Since location access has not been granted, this app will not be able to discover beacons when running in background. Bluetooth needede We need the Bluetooth to be enabled to detect beacons. Please enable bluetooth. Internet needede We need Internet to be enabled to detect beacons. Please enable Internet connection.
